review:
I am married this year with my boyfriend after completing10 yrs of love journey. I met him in 2008, when this movie releases. After watching this movie, given CD to him and asked that he want him to love me like him.. 
God knows I was kidding but he seriously be with me in all ups & downs.. ( I had lost my two brothers, have a 10 yr younger sister he take cares her too and old parents). He never back and always stay with me. He loves with his heart. 
This is amazing movie with awesome love story ...MORE

God knows I was kidding but he seriously be with me in all ups & downs.. ( I had lost my two brothers, have a 10 yr younger sister he take cares her too and old parents). He never back and always stay with me. He loves with his heart. 
This is amazing movie with awesome love story.Also, very close to me. 😍😍

Rajshri films are my all time favorite movies and the love the story line of these pictures directed and produced by rajshri. The elder daughter of the house does not marry till her brother and sister are settled and get marry with perfect partner, This movie has full of emotion, drama, love and friendship. I love the acting of the herione in this movie. I rate it 4.5/5.

Seen this movie more than 20 times its just wow...always give good vibes specially for our family both of them kept patience and trust on their love...and did everything to make their family happy...just wow
And the music theme in movie is awesome 😍
